about_the_game:
Noblemen: 1941 is a tactical 3rd person shooter with strategic elements set in a dark, alternate reality WW II. Secure resources and manage your armies on large scale strategic maps. Fight battles using realistic combat mechanics and tactics in 3rd person. Choose which units to deploy in battle and use powerful abilities to destroy your enemies. Play through 3 campaigns, one for each nation.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The year is 1941 and the world is in ruin. The Great Plague has decimated the world's population, food and resources are scarce, and religious dogma has replaced sense and reason. Some countries have isolated themselves while others seek war, ultimately giving rise to a new World War.

Historic Influence

Although Noblemen: 1941 takes place in an alternate reality, many elements are based on familiar real world events, locations, and scenarios from WWII - such as the beach landings of Normandy, or the desert combat of North Africa.

Realistic Combat Mechanics

Core gunplay is based on realistic mechanics such as armor penetration, bullet physics, suppression, and morale.

Alternate Reality Elements

Experience interesting fictional elements such as brutal melee combat, heavy armor, armored shields, and more. Both deploy and fight against experimental units, mechs, battle suits, and even plague infested ghouls and vampires. Immerse yourself in a war torn, atmospheric world.

"In the face of terror, it is the Noblemen that stand resolute. We are the pillars of hope, guiding the path for those that falter." --Cody Lee, United States Nobleman, 1896, The Plague War

You are a Nobleman - one of a few powerful individuals with the finest weapons, armor, and personal armies. With the world in ruins, the Noblemen take on the burden of war for their nations.

Gain experience and level up your Noblemen, progress through skill trees, unlock abilities, and customize your arsenal with a variety of historic and fictional weapons and equipment. In battle you will deploy and lead a variety of units, armor, and vehicles. 

"To a Nobleman, the common man is nothing but a pawn, moved and sacrificed at the whims of those who grasp the board." --Heinrich Wagner, German Noblemen, 1938, Dawn of WWII

Play through single player campaigns with each nation - manage resources and logistics, build defenses, plan your attacks, then fight and lead the battles in the field across a variety of locations and scenarios against the other nations. Play in asymmetrical battles where your unit choices, strategy, and 3rd person combat abilities determine victory.

Distinct Factions

Choose from three different nations - each with unique Noblemen, units, equipment, abilities and single player campaign.

Single Player

Play through single player campaigns with each nation, meeting interesting characters and discovering deep world lore.

"Any man can be rich, but a true Nobleman must possess the wisdom to lead, the honor to inspire trust, the courage to face adversity, and the prowess to triumph in battle." --Claude Laurent, French Nobleman, 1778, Revolutionary War

  • Dark, alternate reality 1941

  • Intense shooter combat - take part in large scale battles

  • 3 distinct nations, each with their own Noblemen, units, equipment, and abilities

  • Fight alongside infantry, tanks, mechs, experimental units, artillery and more

  • Realistic combat with armor penetration, bullet physics, unit morale, suppression, and combat awareness

  • Use powerful abilities in combat - blast the enemy with artillery, call in air support, build structures, and more

  • Single Player Campaign - manage resources and logistics, plan your attacks, then fight and lead the battles in the field across a variety of locations and scenarios

  • RPG like character progression, broad technology trees, and weapon customization

  • Incredible scale - watch as fortresses blast the battlefield from a distance, planes fly overhead, and tanks and mechs support infantry squads

"Without war, a Nobleman is like a caged lion... The call of battle is the rhythm of his heart, the clash of steel the song of his soul. In times of peace, he wanders the halls of his estate, yearning for the conflict that gives his life purpose." --Aleksandr Volkov, Soviet Nobleman, 1913, Dawn of WWI

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay consists of frequent violence and some blood.

short_description: Noblemen: 1941 is a tactical 3rd person shooter with strategic elements set in a gritty, alternate reality World War 2. Explore, attack, fortify, and plan your actions on large maps. Fight in and lead large battles using combined arms - deploy infantry, mechs, tanks, battle suits, and more!

*languages with full audio support
